sqlMap.select: WITH T AS (SELECT ROWNUM NO , AA.* FROM (SELECT SEQ , BIZ_CODE , BIZ_ITEM , TARGET_RESULT , TARGET_TIME , REAL_TIME , PROG_RATE , PLAN_DO , GAB_ANAL , SCHEDULE_DT , REG_DT , (SELECT NAME FROM PDS_USER WHERE ID=REG_USER) REG_USER , UPDATE_DT , UPDATE_USER FROM PDS_CONTENT WHERE REG_USER=#userId# AND REG_DT > SYSDATE-DECODE(#period#,'1',7,'2',30,'3',365) ORDER BY REG_DT DESC ) AA ) SELECT A.TOT_CNT, T.* FROM T, (SELECT COUNT(*) TOT_CNT FROM T ) A WHERE T.NO > ($page$-1)*10 AND T.NO <= $page$*10
